name: Twisted Dream
description:
Twisted Dream:

The game is about a child that wants to check out his birthday gift that is brought by his parents. When his parents left, he decided to approach to the gift box; the child knows that whats inside the gift is a doll but when he opened the gift, the doll seems to be missing its parts and apparently it got scattered around the house.

With a twist,

The player's goal is to help the child to collect the pieces of the doll.
